mapper.select: select * from BOARD B, MEMBER M where M.M_ID=#{id} and B.M_NO = M.M_NO order by B.B_RDATE desc
select * from BOARD B, MEMBER M where M.M_NO=#{m_no} and B.M_NO = M.M_NO order by B.B_RDATE desc
select count(*) from BOARD where M_NO=#{m_no}
select count(*) from FOLLOWER F, MEMBER M where M.M_NO=#{m_no} and M.M_NO=F.M_NO
select count(*) from FOLLOWING F, MEMBER M where M.M_NO=#{m_no} and M.M_NO=F.M_NO
select count(*) from LIKES L, MEMBER M where M.M_NO=#{m_no} and M.M_NO=L.M_NO
select max(B_NO) from BOARD where M_NO=#{m_no}
select M.M_ID from (select F.M_NO2 from FOLLOWER F, MEMBER M where M.M_NO=F.M_NO and M.M_NO=#{m_no}), FOLLOWER F, MEMBER M where F.M_NO2=M.M_NO
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD values(BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{m_no}, null, #{b_content}, 0, 0, BOARD_SEQ.currval, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update BOARD set B_LIKE = B_LIKE + 1 where B_NO=#{b_no}
update BOARD set B_LIKE = B_LIKE - 1 where B_NO=#{b_no}
